article: One day Mr and Mr Black went shopping by car. They stopped their car near a  shop  .They bought many things from the shop and the things were very  _  .They wanted to put them  in their car  .But Mr Black can't  _  the door of the car. "Let's ask a policeman for  help  .,"said Mrs Black. The policeman was very  _  to help them open the door of the car. At that time a  _  .came up and shouted ,"what are you doing with  my car  ?"Mr and Mrs Black looked at the  _  of the car. Then they said  _  to the man.
